name: Escape From the Planet of the Dravids
name_original: Escape From the Planet of the Dravids
description:
Coney has crash landed in the desolate wastes of a bizarre planet!  Can you rescue him?

This is a game I wrote back in 2016.  It's my first complete game!  Unfortunately I no longer have access to Adobe Animator so I'm just posting the old binary and can no longer edit it to remove the ad at the beginning.
